refnamediv.refpurpose: compiles a new orchestra passed in as an ASCII string

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Compilestr will compile one or more instruments at init time, which will be added to the running engine. In case of existing instrument numbers or names, these will be replaced, but any instance still running of the old instrument definition will still perform until it terminates. Only new instances will use the new definition. Multi-line strings are accepted, using {{ }} to enclose the string.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: Sorch -- a string (in double-quotes or enclosed by {{ }}) containing one or more instruments.
ires -- returns 0 if compilation was successful, or -1 if not.
